metadata.synopsis: Volo recognizes the player as they approach, when he's trapped by goblins and trying to make his own way through the camp without the player's input.

0.speaker: Volo
0.text: Ah... a stranger in our fair camp!
0.context: NodeContext: Volo recognizes the playerb ut is playing dumb.

1.speaker: Volo
1.text: Come, fill in the front row!
1.context: NodeContext: Volo invites player to listen to his ballad.
